# delegate

**Instance Property**

The receiver’s delegate or `nil` if it doesn’t have a delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UIActionSheetDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

For a list of methods your delegate object can implement, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActionSheetDelegate].

## Setting properties

- **title**: The string that appears in the receiver’s title bar.
- **isVisible**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is displayed.
- **actionSheetStyle**: The receiver’s presentation style.
